Functions

void computeFDGrad2D (array2D T, size_t m1, size_t m2, double h1, double h2, boundary_t bc, array3D dT)
 Compute gradient of T usTg central fTite differences; at the boundarys DIRICHLET or NEUMANN are used, d1T[j1][j2] = 1/2* ( T[j1+1][j2] - T[j1-1][j2]) d2T[j1][j2] = 1/2* ( T[j1][j2+1] - T[j1][j2-1]).
void evalDisplacementLinear2D (array2D T, size_t m1, size_t m2, array2D U1, array2D U2, array2D Tphi)
 Interpolate the two-dimensional image T linear, such that Tphi[j1][j2] = T(j1+U1[j1][j2] , j2+U2[j1][j2]).

size_t  m1,

double  h1,
double  h2,
boundary_t  bc,
array3D  dT

Compute gradient of T usTg central fTite differences; at the boundarys DIRICHLET or NEUMANN are used, d1T[j1][j2] = 1/2* ( T[j1+1][j2] - T[j1-1][j2]) d2T[j1][j2] = 1/2* ( T[j1][j2+1] - T[j1][j2-1]).

Stefan Heldmann, Nils Papenberg

size_t  m1,
size_t  m2,
array2D  U1,
array2D  U2,
array2D  Tphi
) 
 

Interpolate the two-dimensional image T linear, such that Tphi[j1][j2] = T(j1+U1[j1][j2] , j2+U2[j1][j2]).
